turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you help me order a drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get a venti iced coffee mocha with 2% milk with whipped cream on top and sprinkles.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Starbucks on 1500 Broadway in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a venti iced caffe mocha with 2%, sprinkles, and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on 1500 broadway street, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much for your help.
